name: Drawdown
description:
Early prototype; please be kind. Made for the Trans Joy Jam.

Trans joy for me is imagining spaces better suited to support us. Drawdown is a city builder that treats climate as an integral part of the city. The full game will involve balancing cost with health, happiness, and ecological impact to make your tiny slice of green utopia.

In addition to the prototype, an artist's statement and concept mockups are available for download.
